item.description:
Come, join us for another, wonderful after work at the Westin in Waltham.  We will meet in their large front living-room type area which is just inside the main hotel entrance and has a great view of Rte. 128 and the reservoir.  If the weather is nice, we may be able to use their new outdoor patio area which overlooks Rte. 128 and has an awning.

There is free parking in their convenient parking garage. 

Bring your active, single, professional friends and join us.

This is always a popular venue with many interesting people.

The hotel's number is 1-781-290-5600.

 

Take Rte. 128 to exit 27, Totten Pond Rd./Winter St., Waltham, approx. 2 miles north of the junction of Rte. 128 and the Mass. Turnpike.  Take 3rd Avenue to the hotel and you will see the parking garage.
item.name: Another "Afterwork"...why, because they're a blast!
